pr_title: Adding config option to persist tags through restart

timeline.body: Are there any situations where we would want to add a Tag/Untag option to npcs which don't exist or have no name? I don't think so. Maybe just `return;`
timeline.bodyText: Are there any situations where we would want to add a Tag/Untag option to npcs which don't exist or have no name? I don't think so. Maybe just return;
timeline.bodyHTML: Are there any situations where we would want to add a Tag/Untag option to npcs which don't exist or have no name? I don't think so. Maybe just return;
timeline.author: Adam-

replies.bodyText: Even if this fails the normal "Tag" option can still be displayed since it's based on the event information. Only reason I did this
replies.author: zeffirojoe

replies.bodyText: Right, but I don't think that makes sense? I think it either can't happen, or if it did happen isn't something we would want to try and handle anyway.
replies.author: Adam-

timeline.body: Declare `final String npcName = npc.getName().toLowerCase();` once and then reference it and below.
timeline.bodyText: Declare final String npcName = npc.getName().toLowerCase(); once and then reference it and below.
timeline.bodyHTML: Declare final String npcName = npc.getName().toLowerCase(); once and then reference it and below.

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
tagAllEntry.setOption((Arrays.stream(config.getNpcToHighlight().split(",")).anyMatch(npc -> npc.toLowerCase().equals(npcCached.getName().toLowerCase())) ? UNTAG_ALL : TAG_ALL));
tagAllEntry.setOption(highlights.contains(npcName) ? UNTAG_ALL : TAG_ALL));

Adam-

Suggested change
tagEntry.setOption((highlightedNpcs.contains(npcCached) ? UNTAG : TAG));

timeline.body:
This should include a comment explaining what it is trying to do, eg
```java
// Only add Untag options to npcs not highlighted by a wildcard entry, because untag-all will not remove wildcards
```

timeline.body:
```suggestion
			final NPC npc = cachedNPCs[id];
```

The "cached" name the API uses is basically mis-named currently.
timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
final NPC npcCached = cachedNPCs[id];
final NPC npc = cachedNPCs[id];

The "cached" name the API uses is basically mis-named currently.

timeline.message:
npc indicators: add (un)tag-all option

This modifies the tagged npc list allowing all npcs of a certain name to
be tagged

Co-authored-by: Adam <Adam@sigterm.info>
